import{combineReducers}from"redux";import{persistReducer}from"redux-persist";import storage from"redux-persist/lib/storage";import autoMergeLevel2 from"redux-persist/lib/stateReconciler/autoMergeLevel2";import cartReducer from"./cart/cart.reducer";import userReducer from"./users/users.reducer";import directoryReducer from"./directory/directory.reducer";import shopReducer from"./shop/shop.reducer";var rootReducer=combineReducers({user:userReducer,cart:cartReducer,directory:directoryReducer,shop:shopReducer});var persistConfig={// key value
key:"root",storage:storage,// only cart will be persisted
whitelist:["cart"],stateReconciler:autoMergeLevel2};// enhanced rootReducer
var persistedReducer=persistReducer(persistConfig,rootReducer);export default persistedReducer;
